FactSet | Full-stack Engineer w/Devops Focus | Norwalk, CT | Full-time, Onsite | $100k - $150k

FactSet is a financial data and software company providing market data and analytics to investment professionals.

We're looking for someone to help architect, build, and maintain our internal platform-as-a-service used by all of FactSet's developers. We operate at all levels of the stack: UX/UI, APIs (Go), databases, Linux kernel, and system administration. We use tools like Packer, Terraform, Chef, and Prometheus to manage our cloud and on-premise infrastructure. We provide Docker containers, PostgreSQL, Redis, and much more as-a-service to the rest of the company.

Apply today! https://factset.mua.hrdepartment.com/hr/ats/Posting/share/54...

Generous paid time off | Free working lunch | Comprehensive health coverage | 401K | Certification reimbursement
